channel.title: Comments on: Create a Realistic Winter Scene Using Snow Overlays in Photoshop

item.title: By: textures4photoshop.com
item.dc:creator: textures4photoshop.com
item.description: If you want to share the results you get by following this tutorial, please upload your photos in the comments!
item.content:encoded: If you want to share the results you get by following this tutorial, please upload your photos in the comments!

item.title: By: Tony S
item.dc:creator: Tony S
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/snow-overlays-photoshop/#comment-22">textures4photoshop.com</a>.
Yes, YouTube is perfect...don't know why the one above is blurry, but thank you so much for accommodating my request. Also, YT has the transcript so "...two birds with one..." :)
Superb effect *and* tutorial...kudos. Thanks, again!
Regards, ---Tony
item.content:encoded:
In reply to textures4photoshop.com.

Yes, YouTube is perfect…don’t know why the one above is blurry, but thank you so much for accommodating my request. Also, YT has the transcript so “…two birds with one…” ðŸ™‚

Superb effect *and* tutorial…kudos. Thanks, again!

Regards,
—Tony

item.title: By: textures4photoshop.com
item.dc:creator: textures4photoshop.com
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/snow-overlays-photoshop/#comment-21">Tony S</a>.
Hi Tony,
the video is in 1080p resolution, you only need to make it full screen. If that doesn't work, I've added the link to the YouTube video so you can watch the tutorial there and select the 1080p version from the gear icon. Hope this works for you
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tony S.

Hi Tony,

the video is in 1080p resolution, you only need to make it full screen. If that doesn’t work, I’ve added the link to the YouTube video so you can watch the tutorial there and select the 1080p version from the gear icon. Hope this works for you

item.title: By: Tony S
item.dc:creator: Tony S
item.description: This sounds like a great tutorial. However, I don't find it useful since the video resolution is so poor whether watching in normal or full-screen mode. Is there any chance you can produce better video or post a narrative tut. It would be greatly appreciated...
item.content:encoded: This sounds like a great tutorial. However, I don’t find it useful since the video resolution is so poor whether watching in normal or full-screen mode. Is there any chance you can produce better video or post a narrative tut. It would be greatly appreciated…

Thank you so much Su! Glad you like the tetxures

item.title: By: Su Hall
item.dc:creator: Su Hall
item.description: What an awesome effect! I love your textures, by the way! Adding those to your image, along weith all the adjustments and such, really makes a great effect! Thank you for the great tut! Su
item.content:encoded:
What an awesome effect! I love your textures, by the way! Adding those to your image, along weith all the adjustments and such, really makes a great effect!
Thank you for the great tut!
Su
